long_description: The Novara Edgewater bike jacket stands out among cycling jackets because of the stylish design that lets you wear it anywhere. On your bike, it gives you great protection against wind and rain. Durable Water Repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off, fending off light rain showers and snow. Windproof up to 60 mph. Reverse side of belt is reflective to keep you visible in low light; cuffs also show reflective trim when rolled down. Media port lets you conveniently listen to music while you're walking around town. 2 front zippered pockets; 2 rear zippered pockets to securely store essentials. The Novara Edgewater bike jacket has a double vent at back hem for ease of movement while riding.
